messages.riddle: Lighter than what I'm made of and I hide more of myself than you can see.What am I?
messages.author: Adams John

messages.riddle: I canâ€™t be used unless I am broken. What am I?
messages.author: Bach Johann Sebastian
messages.hint: Drop me and you wil break me

messages.riddle: I always go up and never come down. What am I
messages.author: Barber Samuel

messages.riddle: I have holes in my top and bottom my left and right and my middle. But still I hold water. What am I?
messages.author: Beethoven Ludwig Van

messages.riddle: Wetter and wetter I get the more I dry. Wring me and I will cry.What am I?
messages.author: Brahms Johannes
